docs.title: MkDocs Advanced SEO Plugin
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for mkdocs-advanced-seo. This plugin provides a comprehensive, deep, and robust SEO solution for MkDocs sites.

docs.title: Core Features
docs.text:
• Automated Meta Tags: Intelligent generation of description, keywords, and author tags.
  • Social Media Ready: Full support for Open Graph and Twitter Cards.
  • Smart Integration: Auto-detects social images from mkdocs-material and dates from mkdocs-document-dates.
  • Structured Data: JSON-LD generation for better Google Rich Results.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
In your mkdocs.yml:

plugins:
  - advanced-seo:
      url_base: https://your-site.com

That's it! The plugin will auto-configure based on your site_name, site_description, and other standard MkDocs settings.

docs.title: Configuration Reference
docs.text: Option Type Default Description url_base str site_url Base URL for canonical links. use_canonical_url bool true Enable canonical URL tags. use_open_graph bool true Enable Open Graph tags. use_twitter_cards bool true Enable Twitter Cards. add_schema_org_json_ld bool true Inject JSON-LD structured data. og_type str website Default Open Graph type. support_document_dates bool true Use dates from other plugins.

docs.title: Social Cards Integration
docs.text:
If you use mkdocs-material with the social plugin:

plugins:
  - social
  - advanced-seo

The plugin will automatically detect generated social card images and use them for og:image and twitter:image. No extra configuration required!
